gen:link.msg:message: `DamagesForOwnAccount` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementTechnicalAccountIndemnityInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1EM4_DamagesForOwnAccount')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementTechnicalAccountIndemnityInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1EM4_DamagesForOwnAccount return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementTechnicalAccountIndemnityInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1EM4_ChildrenOfDamagesForOwnAccountDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementTechnicalAccountIndemnityInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1EM4_ChildrenOfDamagesForOwnAccountDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementTechnicalAccountIndemnityInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1EM4_ChildrenOfDamagesForOwnAccountCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementTechnicalAccountIndemnityInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1EM4_ChildrenOfDamagesForOwnAccountCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
